translations.Stay legally and continue your studies s: 合法居留，顺利继续学业
translations.Proof of Funds (bank balance, scholarshi: 资金证明（银行余额、奖学金等）
translations.Apply 2–3 months before your current vis: 请在当前签证到期前2-3个月办理续签。选择最近的入国管理局，亲自递交申请材料。
translations.If approved, you will receive a new peri: 如获批准，您的在留卡将盖有新的居留期限印章。
translations.4. Keep Copies & Notify School: 4. 保存复印件并通知学校
translations.Notify your university and keep records: 请及时通知学校，并妥善保管更新后的签证及相关材料，以备后用。
translations.Immigration Services Agency (Japan): 日本出入国在留管理厅
translations.Visa Info @ Study in Japan: Study in Japan 签证信息
translations.Address: 1-2-61 Koraku, Bunkyo City, Tok: 地址：日本东京都文京区后乐1-2-61，邮编123-0006
